marketing.title: Marketing Materials
marketing.subtitle: Tools and resources to promote your referral link
marketing.trackPerformance: Track how your marketing efforts are performing
marketing.tipsToMaximize: Tips to maximize your referral success
marketing.beAuthenticDesc: Share your genuine experience with Stream Sales. Personal stories resonate better than generic marketing copy.
marketing.targetAudienceDesc: Focus on people who would genuinely benefit from digital products - content creators, educators, and entrepreneurs.
marketing.useMultipleChannelsDesc: Share your referral link on social media, email, blogs, and direct messages. Different platforms reach different audiences.
marketing.provideValueDesc: Don't just drop your link. Explain what Stream Sales offers and how it can help. Add a call-to-action that motivates sign-ups.
marketing.followUpDesc: Check in with people who showed interest. Answer questions and provide support to help them get started.
marketing.faqDesc: Answers to common questions about the program
marketing.faqQ1: How much commission do I earn per referral?
marketing.faqA1: You earn commission on both registrations and sales made by your referrals. Check the Commissions page for specific rates.
marketing.faqQ2: When can I request a payment?
marketing.faqA2: You can request payment once your available balance reaches $50 or more. Payments are typically processed within 5-7 business days.
marketing.faqQ3: Can I track individual referral performance?
marketing.faqA3: Yes! Go to the Referrals page to see detailed information about each person you've referred, including their activity and commissions generated.
marketing.faqQ4: Are there any restrictions on promotion?
marketing.faqA4: Please promote ethically and honestly. Avoid spam, misleading claims, or paid advertising without disclosure. Quality over quantity!
marketing.ctaMessage: Start sharing your referral link today and earn commission on every successful referral!
